option.name: originalContent
option.value:
org.jetbrains.dokka.experimental.gradle.pluginMode=V2Enabled org.jetbrains.dokka.experimental.gradle.pluginMode.noWarn=true
# JVM Configuration - Java 24 Optimized (Comprehensive Android Build Tools Access) org.gradle.jvmargs=-Xmx16g -Xms4g -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=2048m \ --add-opens=java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.lang.invoke=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.lang.reflect=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.util.concurrent=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.util.concurrent.atomic=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.nio=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.nio.file=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.nio.charset=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.net=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.io=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.security=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.text=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.time=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.prefs/java.util.prefs=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.xml/javax.xml.namespace=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-exports=jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.api=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-exports=jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.util=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-exports=java.base/sun.nio.ch=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-exports=java.base/sun.security.util=ALL-UNNAMED \ --enable-native-access=ALL-UNNAMED
# Windows Path Compatibility # Windows Path Workaround - Fix for spaces in project path android.aapt2.ignoreAssetsPattern=!.svn:!.git:!.ds_store:!*.scc:.*:!CVS:!thumbs.db:!picasa.ini:!*~ file.encoding=UTF-8 systemProp.file.encoding=UTF-8 # Essential JVM configuration with UTF-8 encoding for Windows # System-wide file encoding (critical for Windows path handling) systemProp.user.country=US systemProp.user.language=en
# Android-specific Windows compatibility settings android.useAndroidX=true android.enableJetifier=false android.nonTransitiveRClass=true
# Workaround for AGP resource validation bug on Windows
# Performance optimizations for Windows builds org.gradle.parallel=true org.gradle.caching=true org.gradle.daemon=false org.gradle.workers.max=1

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
org.jetbrains.dokka.experimental.gradle.pluginMode=V2Enabled org.jetbrains.dokka.experimental.gradle.pluginMode.noWarn=true
# JVM Configuration - Java 24 Optimized (Comprehensive Android Build Tools Access) org.gradle.jvmargs=-Xmx16g -Xms4g -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=2048m \ --add-opens=java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.lang.invoke=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.lang.reflect=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.util.concurrent=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.util.concurrent.atomic=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.nio=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.nio.file=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.nio.charset=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.net=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.io=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.security=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.text=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.base/java.time=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.prefs/java.util.prefs=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-opens=java.xml/javax.xml.namespace=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-exports=jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.api=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-exports=jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.util=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-exports=java.base/sun.nio.ch=ALL-UNNAMED \ --add-exports=java.base/sun.security.util=ALL-UNNAMED \ --enable-native-access=ALL-UNNAMED
# Windows Path Compatibility # Windows Path Workaround - Fix for spaces in project path android.aapt2.ignoreAssetsPattern=!.svn:!.git:!.ds_store:!*.scc:.*:!CVS:!thumbs.db:!picasa.ini:!*~ file.encoding=UTF-8 systemProp.file.encoding=UTF-8 # Essential JVM configuration with UTF-8 encoding for Windows # System-wide file encoding (critical for Windows path handling) systemProp.user.country=US systemProp.user.language=en
# Android-specific Windows compatibility settings android.useAndroidX=true android.enableJetifier=false android.nonTransitiveRClass=true
# Workaround for AGP resource validation bug on Windows android.disableResourceValidation=true
# Performance optimizations for Windows builds org.gradle.parallel=true org.gradle.caching=true org.gradle.daemon=false org.gradle.workers.max=1
